ygData.subject: Re: Nelferous's Mallet
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think it s the damage/speed ratio that s in question so much, as much as the +20 vs all saves and the 1 or .1 weight of the weapon.  I ll grant for the
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think it's the damage/speed ratio that's in question so much, as
much as the +20 vs all saves and the 1 or .1 weight of the weapon. I'll
grant for the weight that the person that posted that may not have known
what it was and just put that down, but +20 vs all saving throws is a little
bit on the high side for any piece of equipment that I've heard of or seen.
I've seen pieces that'll do +10 or even +15 to a single save, but +20 I
would think is a little extreme. Really would like to see the weapon exist,
don't get me wrong, but until I see a screenshot of it, I'll have to remain
a skeptic. :)

--
Mike Schlagenhauf
trelane@...

From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>

Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Nelferous's Mallet


> From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>

> I don't know why yall thin it's too good to be true. Compare it to the
> fiery avenger. The stats on the avenger are like.. 35 damage.. 45
> delay. That still blows away tihs weapon. Compare this weapon to the
> executioners axe.. it gets blown away again. This weapon may or may
> not exist. I don't konw. If it does.. good... if it doesn't.. there
> is still a cleric only weapon out there that is very powerful.
